references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), a foundational technique for novel view synthesis that many subsequent methods, including this one, build upon.

references.paper_title: Expressive body capture: 3d hands, face, and body from a single image
references.reason: This paper introduces the SMPL-X model, a key component of the proposed method, which provides a realistic and expressive representation of the human body.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, the core rendering technique used in the proposed method, which enables efficient and high-quality rendering of complex 3D scenes.
